songs.title: Heat
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I’m no angel
That we both know
I thought that from friction our fire would grow
If I’m mistaken, and love ain't for sure
We’ll turn into phoenixes both rising slow
The day you walked, the day you walked away from me
I had to change your heart you left for
That made me see
No matter where you are if knowing me
I’m incomplete

[Chorus]
And I know I need you, half much more
No one to give it all
My breaking heart won't bleed
You’ve got to
Do this, do this to me
Do this, do this for me
The last one standing
But I won’t bleed
You’ve got to
Do this, do this for me
Do this, do this
In the heat of it all
When you’re ready to roll

[Verse 2]
When bo-
